There is a theory, called "Six degrees of separation", that states that any two people can be connected by a chain of less than six people. Basically, "I know a guy, who knows a guy, who knows a guy, who knows Bill Gates". Something to that effect. This game thread has a similar purpose, but will take many more than six links.

Our goal is to connect Julius Caesar to Queen Victoria

RULES:

-Must be confirmed historical figures.

-When you add a new link, they must have really met in person at some point (for example Socrates met Plato, as he was Plato's teacher).

-So being related doesnt matter if they were never alive at the same time and so never met.

-Feel free to use any sources you need, provided they aren't blatantly false.

-Ideally your link will move our chronology closer to the present day, not farther backwards.

-Feel free to use lines of succession, marriages, easy stuff like that to advance the game.

-Also if a person is know by multiple names, include a few if you want (Alexander III of Macedon also called Alexander the Great) as long as its clear who you are talking about.

-If there is a ninja post then edit it or if its not noticed by its poster, work off the oldest post of the two.

I will start.

Julius Caesar was friends with Gaius Octavius(later known as Augustus Caesar)
